event.executesql: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.indexes WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[DDAStatement]') AND name = N'idx_DDAStatement_AccountNumber') BEGIN CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [idx_DDAStatement_AccountNumber] ON [dbo].[DDAStatement] ( [AccountNumber] ASC, [StartDate] ASC, [EndDate] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] END

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.indexes WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[DDAStatement]') AND name = N'idx_DDAStatement_AccountUID') BEGIN CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [idx_DDAStatement_AccountUID] ON [dbo].[DDAStatement] ( [AccountUID] ASC, [StartDate] ASC, [EndDate] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] END
